rukus.text: 46|11|Bu xindao de renmen pinglun xindao de renmen shuo:“Jiaruo na shi yi jian shanshi, tamen bude zai women zhiqian xinfeng ta.” Tamen meiyou yin “gulanjing” er zunxun zhengdao,〔gu tamen de pianzhi yi xianzhule〕. Tamen yao shuo:“Zhe shi chenfu de wangyan.”

46|12|Zai ta zhiqian, you mu sa de jingdian zuo shiren de zhunsheng he enhui. Zhe shi yi ben alabo wen de jingdian, neng zhengshi yiqian de tian jing, yibian ta jinggao bu yi de renmen, bing zuo xingshan zhe de jiayin.
46|13|Naxie shuoguo:“Women de zhu shi an la,” ranhou zunxun zhengdao de renmen, jianglai meiyou kongju, ye bu youchou;
46|14|zhe deng ren, shi leyuan de jumin, jiang yong ju qizhong; zhe shi weile baochou tamen de xingwei.

46|15|Wo ceng ming ren xiaojing fumu; ta de muqin, xinku de huaizhe ta, xinku di sheng ta, zai ta shoutai he duan ru de shiqi, gongji shi sanshi ge yue. Dang ta dadao zhuangnian, zai dadao sishi sui de shihou, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni qishi wo, shi wo ganxie ni suo shi yu wo he wo de fumu de enhui, bingxing ni suo xiyue de shanshi. Qiu ni wei wo gaishan wo de houyi. Wo que yi xiang ni huizui, wo que shi yige shunfu zhe.”
46|16|Zhe deng ren, wo jieshou tamen de shangong, wo she you tamen de zui'e, tamen jiang chengwei leyuan de jumin. Zhe shi tamen suo shou de zhenshi de yingxu.

46|17|You ren dui ta de fumu shuo “ai! Ni lia donghe wo shuo: Wo yao fuhuo ma? Zai wo zhiqian, you xuduo shidai, que yi shiqule.” Ta lia xiang an la qiuyuan, bingqie shuo:“Shang zai ni! Ni xindao ba, an la de yingxu, que shi zhenshi de!” Ta shuo:“Zhe zhishi guren de gushi.”
46|18|Zhe deng ren, yingdang shou xingfa de panjue, er ru yu yiqian shiqu de jingling he renlei de ge minzu zhi zhong; tamen que shi kui she de.
46|19|Tamen jiang yin ziji de xingwei er ge you ruogan dengji, yibian an la dui tamen de xingwei jiyu wanquan de baochou, tamen bu shou kui wang.

46|20|Bu xindao de renmen zaoshou huoxing zhi ri, huozhe jiang dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zai chenshi shenghuo zhong, yi jiang nimen de fu fen xiao jin xiang wan; jinri nimen ying shou lingru de xingfa, yinwei nimen ceng zai difang shang wangzizunda, ye yinwei nimen cengjing fanzui.”
